TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
You die of cancer.

I want to not want to want

Granted. You no longer want to do anything. Why did you think this was a good idea again?

I wish for a plutonium AND an immortality license

Granted. Your license get lost in the mail, and your plutonium gets you on the FBI's watch list.

I wish for a car.

Granted. Your license get lost in the mail, and your plutonium gets you on the FBI's watch list.

I wish for a car.

Granted, you get this car

I also wish for more movie references, even if I don't know the movie.

Granted, but you do know the movie, and the references are only from the ones you hate.

I want a day off.

Granted. You return to work to seeing that everyone is dead, and the only way to have prevented it was if one more person was sitting in a cubicle.

I wish for Gamecube

Granted, but the world only exists in 2 dimensions, so there are no cubes.

I wish for math.

Granted, but now everyone around you insists it should be "maths", which you know is not so and which drives you literally crazy.

I wish for a license that authorizes me to poison the pigeons in the park.

Granted, but the pigeons poison you as well.

I wish that Math(s) is fun for everyone!

Granted, but just because something is fun doesn't mean that it's being done right.

I want a pony.

granted, but it's a MLP.

I wish that someone ruined my wish...

Edited May 27, 2015 by Astrofox

Denied! You get your wish, exactly as you stated it!

I wish for fish.

Granted, however, it will eat you since it's a very hungry and aggressive shark.

I wish for something.

Granted, But it is a flea

I wish for a cheater

Granted. He drops the die, and loots all of your items.

I wish for a goofy kitchen fish mitten.

Granted, but the mitten is sticking your hand in a fishes mouth.

I wish maxis was not owned by ea.

Granted, maxis is not owned by EA but went bankrupt (as they would have) after SimCity 2000

I wish people would stop making sharks look like human eaters

Granted, sharks are now perceived as kitten eaters and are hated by all internetkind.

I wish I were a great inventor.

Edit: grammar

Edited May 27, 2015 by theend3r

You're a great inventor of sticks.

I wish I could afford all the games I liked.

Granted, but someone robbed a bank and since you can't explain how you got all that money you go to jail.

I wish I found this thread sooner.

You did but then you caused a time-loop and a rip in the fabric of space-time and the forums exploded.

I wished I had a time machine.

Granted but you yourself immediately came from the future and destroyed it to prevent a catastrophic outcome.

I wish I could read minds.

Granted, but you read the mind of someone who knew how you would die.

I wish someone would respond.

Granted, however, I have [FATAL ERROR]

I wish that the magic boulder was back in game.

Granted, it is now placed exactly 10 meters above the launch pad.

I wish the launch tower was back in the game.
